data.name: label
data.description: Content or element that triggers the modal.

data.name: header
data.description: Content for the modal header.

data.name: footer
data.description: Content for the modal footer.

data.name: position
data.description: Position of the modal on the screen.

data.name: size
data.description: Size of the modal.

data.name: animation
data.description: Type of animation for the modal.

data.name: animate
data.description: Speed of the animation.

data.name: staticBackdrop
data.description: Disables closing the modal by clicking on the backdrop.

data.name: backdrop
data.description: Controls the modal backdrop. Can be boolean or a string for custom backdrop.

data.name: closeBtn
data.description: Shows or hides the close button.

data.name: modalStatus
data.description: Tracks the visibility status of the modal.

data.name: closeOnEsc
data.description: Allows closing the modal with the Escape key.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Border-radius of the modal.

data.name: modalHeaderClasses
data.description: CSS classes for the modal header.

data.name: modalBodyClasses
data.description: CSS classes for the modal body.

data.name: modalFooterClasses
data.description: CSS classes for the modal footer.

data.name: id
data.description: Unique identifier for the modal.

data.name: trigger
data.description: Content or element that triggers the modal.

data.name: header
data.description: Content for the modal header.

data.name: footer
data.description: Content for the modal footer.
